name: Four Knight's of the Apocalypse, Horsemen of Death
text: This card can only be Summoned when you have three other Knight's of the Apocalypse Ritual Monsters on the field. This card gains 500 ATK for each monster in either player's GY(s) or banishment. All of your opponent's cards are banished instead of going to the GY. Once per turn; you can Special Summon a Omni monster from your GY.
